alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Knott; Owsley; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 2:19AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Owsley, northwestern Perry, northwestern Knott and Breathitt Counties through 245 AM EST... At 219 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buckhorn, or 13 miles northwest of Hyden, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bush Branch, Altro, Chavies, Krypton and Canoe around 225 AM EST. Wolf Coal, Barwick, Whick, Little, Lamont, Saldee, Copland, Howard Creek and Curt around 230 AM EST. Ned, Watts, Clayhole, Flintville, Lost Creek, Haddix, Dice and Quicksand around 235 AM EST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
